feed.title: oclif: The Open CLI Framework Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest oclif: The Open CLI Framework news and events.

entry.title: Introducing oclif
entry.summary: Coding for the browser takes serious time. You need to deal with front-end JS, CSS, design, product, and a ton more. On the other hand, building for a CLI takes a fraction of the effort. This makes CLIs particularly great for prototyping out new functionality, offering admin/internal tools, or power-user functionality.
